text: The Asiatic wildcat (Felis silvestris ornata) is also known as the Asian Steppe wildcat or Indian Desert cat. It is a subspecies of the Wildcat. It lives mainly in the Thar Desert, and the Rann of Kutch in India and Pakistan. It is about the size of a domestic cat, with a pale yellowish body marked with black spots. ==References== ==Other websites== *IUCN/SSC Cat Specialist Group: Asiatic Wildcat Category:Felines Category:Mammals of Pakistan Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Asiatic wildcat
